Melbourne Beach
Melbourne Beach is a town in Brevard County, Florida.
Get in
Melbourne Intl (MLB)
Orlando Intl (MCO)
Palm Beach Intl (PBI)
Valkyria
Sebastian
By bus
Space Coast Area Transit is the name of the local Brevard County bus service. It is a cheap way to get around and is handicap accessible. The website provides maps and timetables. Buses travel to most sites and places of interest. $1.25 per ride, or $35 for a monthly pass.
See
Sebastian Inlet State Park, 9700 South A1A (15 miles south of Melbourne Beach), ☏ +1 321-984-4852 .
Do
Fishing on the beach, the Indian River Lagoon at Honest John's Fishing Camp, at Sebastian Inlet State Park or charter a boat with Capt Dick Catri.
Surfing. At Sebastian Inlet State Park.
Sea turtle watch tour in Archie Carr National Wildlife Refuge.
Golf at Spessard Holland public golf course.
Kayak or canoe at Mullet Creek from historic Honest John's Fishing Camp.
Bird watching
Buy
Bait and fishing tackle:
Inlet Bait & Tackle, inside the Sebastian Inlet State Park
Long Point Bait & Tackle, at the entrance to Long Point Park and Campground
Whitey's Bait & Tackle, 9030 South Hwy A1A, ☏ +1 321-724-1440 .
Surf Side Bait & Tackle, in Floridana
Gold Star Bait & Tackle, on Ocean Ave in downtown Melbourne Beach
Eat
Seafood is the best, caught fresh daily.
New England Eatery, ☏ +1 321-723-6080 . Casual and great local seafood.
DeAngelo's By The Sea, 5935 South A1A, ☏ +1 321-723-0383 . Fine Italian
Long Point Cafe, breakfast and lunch
Surfin' Turtle Bar and Grill, sports bar
Cafe Coconut Cove, 4210 S. Highway A1A, ☏ +1 321-727-3133 . Tu-Sa 5PM-9PM. Family owned, excellent upscale restaurant with beautiful view of sunsets on the river.
Boardwalk Burrito Located among the eateries at the end of US 192, beside Starbucks and Coldstone Creamery. Made to order Burritos, Nachos, Fajitas, etc similar in style to the Moe's franchise. Specials: Tuesday after 4PM-2 for 1 price tacos($3.50, the Mahi Mahi tacos are best) and Friday after 4PM are half price nachos (you can get ultimate nachos and a drink for ~$6)
Friendly Toast (formerly known as "Friendly Toast"), 300 Ocean Ave, ☏ +1 321-733-5590 . Diner-style restaurant. Brilliant breakfasts. A favorite of locals. Great food at great prices. You can eat inside (usually crowded) or at a few tables outside.

Turtle Run Suites.

Port D'Hiver, 201 Ocean Avenue, ☏ +1 321 722-2727 . Ocean views, private porches, delicious breakfasts, concierge service. $200-$525.
